news.title: AI research takes a backseat to profits as Silicon Valley prioritizes products over safety, experts say
news.summary: Tech companies are focusing on AI products over research, say experts. Industry experts are sounding the alarm about safety of AI products. They are concerned that the technology could be used to target people with disabilities.

news.title: CNBC's The China Connection newsletter: U.S.-China relations have changed
news.summary: The world got a taste of an effective U.S.-China trade embargo, and there's no going back. The world got to see the impact of a trade embargo with China.

news.title: Video podcasts are having a moment at media upfronts
news.summary: Podcasts are taking the stage at media companies' annual pitch to advertisers. Podcasts, which are increasingly more popular as videos, are taking up the stage this year.

news.title: Trump meets Syrian leader in Saudi Arabia the day after announcing end of U.S. sanctions
news.summary: Saudi Arabia and Turkey played a key role in convincing Trump to lift sanctions on Syria and meet with al-Sharaa. Saudi Arabia, Turkey's leaders helped convince Trump to remove sanctions.

news.title: 'I like you too much': Trump and Saudi crown prince bask in their friendship
news.summary: U.S.-Saudi Investment Forum includes scores of the world's most powerful CEOs. Among them Elon Musk, Jensen Huang and Larry Fink.

news.title: Warren Buffett’s worst money mistakes are actually a master class in how to invest
news.summary: Berkshire Hathaway has made a series of big mistakes in recent years. The company is now trying to right itself after a string of missteps.

news.title: Investors really want to believe Trump on tariffs — but the truth will hit them soon
news.summary: The 21st century now belongs to China and Asia, says Chinese President Xi Jinping. China is the world's second largest economy, after the U.S., and is the fastest growing region.

news.title: This biotech’s stock rockets on oral obesity drug partnership with Wegovy parent
news.summary: Novo Nordisk looks to harness Septerna’s broader GPCR drug pathways, which include GLP-1, for obesity and diabetes treatments.

news.title: I’m 65 and a widow with 5 children. Should I split my $1.1 million nest egg between them while I’m still alive?
news.summary: “I receive part of my late husband’s government annuity, which is enough for me to live off,” she says.

news.title: Here’s something the rich know about managing investment risk that can help you, too
news.summary: Alternative assets can stabilize your portfolio when the stock market wobbles. Farmland, timber and other alternative assets can stabilise your portfolio during a market wobble.
